mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Including the Highly Gifted and Creative Students – Current Ideas and Future Directions
mods:titleInfo.mods:subTitle: Proceedings of the 11th International Conference on Mathematical Creativity and Giftedness (MCG 11) : 22.08.2019 – 24.08.2019 Universität Hamburg, Germany

mods:name.mods:namePart: Westfalen / Universität Münster / Universitäts- und Landesbibliothek

mods:originInfo.mods:publisher: WTM-Verlag für wissenschaftliche Texte und Medien

mods:mods.mods:abstract: This volume contains the papers presented at the 11th international Conference on Mathematical Crea­tivity and Giftedness (MCG 11) "Including the Highly Gifted and Creative Students – Current Ideas and Future Directions", held from 22.08.2019 – 24.08.2019 in Ham­burg.
